name: laptop-thermal-tips
description: Students swap fixes for laptops throttling during large builds.

events.content: My laptop keeps throttling when compiling the CMake monster in 357. Fans sound like a jet.
Prop the back up with a book and run a cheap USB fan underneath. Drops temps ~10°C for me.
Also set `-j4` instead of `-j16` when running make. You’ll add a minute but keep the CPU below the throttle point.
Thermal paste refresh helped mine but that's weekend work.
Going to try the fan + lower job count. Thanks all.
